name: car battery
description: A 12v lead-acid battery used to power car electrical systems.
//: 58Ah @ 12VDC. Could supply ~700 watts for an hour

name: motorbike battery
description: A 12v lead-acid battery used to power smaller vehicles' electrical systems.
//: 12Ah @ 12VDC. Could supply ~140 watts for an hour

name: medium storage battery
description: A medium storage battery containg multiple lithium ion cells.

name: small storage battery
description: A small storage battery created with pre-Cataclysm lithium ion technology.  Useful for crafting.

name: storage battery
description: A large storage battery containg many lithium ion cells.  Could be installed into a storage battery case for easy removal from a vehicle, or just welded straight in.
